title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFB Special with Jboy on Lincoln Riley --> USC, Best Fit for LSU
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFB Special with Jboy on Lincoln Riley --> USC, Best Fit for LSU
description:
Colin explains why USC's Lincoln Riley hire is actually good news for UCLA's Chip Kelly. Then Jake Crain -- host of The Jboy Show -- joins Colin to discuss why Riley made the move to the Pac-12, the regional differences between Oklahoma and California, how the proposed CFP changes influenced the move, the right coach for LSU, and how the transfer portal has become a total game-changer.

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
